title: quarkus.application.name config property unavailable on 2.6.1.Final

labels.name: triage/needs-reproducer
labels.description: We are waiting for a reproducer.

body:
### Describe the bug

Hello
on Quarkus 2.6.1.Final, it seems it doesnt work again...

	@ConfigProperty(name = "quarkus.application.name")

        Suppressed: java.util.NoSuchElementException: SRCFG00014: The config property application.name is required but it could not be found in any config source


### Expected behavior

quarkus.application.name should provide application name

### Actual behavior

Quarkus Failed to start

### How to Reproduce?

@ConfigProperty(name = "quarkus.application.name")

and mvn quarkus:dev

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

linux

### Output of `java -version`

jdk 11

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

-

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.6.1

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

mvn 3.8.2

### Additional information

_No response_
